import React from"react";import BasicInformation from"./steps/BasicInformation";import RoofCondition from"./steps/RoofCondition";import InsulationPerformance from"./steps/InsulationPerformance";import EnergyDemand from"./steps/EnergyDemand";import Tariffs from"./steps/Tariffs";import Results from"./steps/Results";import DemoMode from"./DemoMode";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MainContent=_ref=>{let{currentStep,selectedData,onDataChange,onStepChange,calculationResult,setCalculationResult,showDemo}=_ref;if(showDemo){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DemoMode,{});}const renderStep=()=>{switch(currentStep){case"basic-information":return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BasicInformation,{data:selectedData,onDataChange:onDataChange,onNext:nextStep=>onStepChange(nextStep||"roof-condition")});case"roof-condition":// Get user location from previous step data for Google Maps
const userLocation=selectedData.latitude&&selectedData.longitude?{lat:parseFloat(selectedData.latitude),lng:parseFloat(selectedData.longitude)}:null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RoofCondition,{data:selectedData,onDataChange:onDataChange,onNext:()=>onStepChange("insulation-performance"),onBack:()=>onStepChange("basic-information"),userLocation:userLocation});case"insulation-performance":return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InsulationPerformance,{data:selectedData,onDataChange:onDataChange,onNext:()=>onStepChange("energy-demand"),onBack:()=>onStepChange("roof-condition")});case"energy-demand":return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EnergyDemand,{data:selectedData,onDataChange:onDataChange,onNext:()=>onStepChange("tariffs"),onBack:()=>onStepChange("insulation-performance")});case"tariffs":return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tariffs,{data:selectedData,onDataChange:onDataChange,onNext:()=>onStepChange("results"),onBack:()=>onStepChange("energy-demand")});case"results":return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Results,{data:selectedData,onDataChange:onDataChange,calculationResult:calculationResult,setCalculationResult:setCalculationResult,onBack:()=>onStepChange("tariffs")});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Step not found"});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main-content",children:renderStep()});};export default MainContent;
